XDptx_DmtMode Struct Reference

#include <xdptx.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This typedef contains the display monitor timing attributes for a video mode.


Public Attributes

XDptx_VideoMode VideoMode
u8 DmtId
u16 HResolution
u16 VResolution

Member Data Documentation

u8 XDptx_DmtMode::DmtId

Standard Display Monitor Timing (DMT) ID number.

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::HBackPorch

Horizontal back porch (in pixels).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::HFrontPorch

Horizontal front porch (in pixels).

u16 XDptx_DmtMode::HResolution

Horizontal resolution (in pixels).

u8 XDptx_DmtMode::HSyncPolarity

Horizontal synchronization polarity (0=positive/1=negative).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::HSyncPulseWidth

Horizontal synchronization time (pulse width in pixels).

u8 XDptx_DmtMode::Interlaced

Input stream interlaced scan (0=non-interlaced/ 1=interlaced).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::PixelClkKhz

Pixel frequency (in KHz). This is also the M value for the video stream (MVid).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::VBackPorch

Vertical back porch (in lines).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::VFrontPorch

Vertical front porch (in lines).

XDptx_VideoMode XDptx_DmtMode::VideoMode

Enumerated key.

u16 XDptx_DmtMode::VResolution

Vertical resolution (in lines).

u8 XDptx_DmtMode::VSyncPolarity

Vertical synchronization polarity (0=positive/1=negative).

u32 XDptx_DmtMode::VSyncPulseWidth

Vertical synchronization time (pulse width in lines).
